mapper.select: SELECT CONCAT(substring(date,7,10),"-",substring(date,1,2),"-",substring(date,4,2)) As date , MeterCategory As meterCategory ,meterSubCategory ,quantity,unitOfMeasure, round(costInBillingCurrency,5) As costInBillingCurrency FROM ERD.USED_AMOUNT WHERE resourceGroupName = #{rscparam}

SELECT rsg_grp AS rscparam ,partition_name AS partitionName ,disk_name AS diskName ,priority AS priority ,limits AS limits ,FORMAT(total,0) AS total ,FORMAT(free,0) AS free ,current AS current ,data AS data ,FORMAT(total - free,0) AS usages ,CONCAT(round(((total - free) / total) * 100,2),'%') AS usageDiskPer ,(SELECT DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(MAX(crt_dtm),'%Y%m%d%H%i%S'),'%Y.%m.%d %H') as updateTm FROM USER_DISK_USAGE WHERE rsg_grp = #{rscparam} AND current != 'N/A') AS updateTm ,(SELECT cfg_value FROM config WHERE cfg_key = 'diskExpansionCriteria') as criteria FROM USER_DISK_USAGE WHERE rsg_grp = #{rscparam} AND current != 'N/A'

SELECT rsg_grp AS rscparam ,FORMAT(total / 1024,0) as total ,CONCAT(round(((total - free) / total) * 100,2),'%') AS usageDiskPer ,b.cpu ,b.ram as memory FROM ( SELECT rsg_grp,sum(total) AS total, sum(free) AS free FROM USER_DISK_USAGE WHERE rsg_grp = #{rscparam} AND current != 'N/A' GROUP BY rsg_grp ) a, ( SELECT cpu, ram FROM azurecost a,( SELECT distinct vm_series_id FROM USER_LIST WHERE rscGrp = #{rscparam} ) b WHERE a.id = b.vm_series_id ) b
SELECT disk_size AS diskSize , round(cost* (SELECT exchangeRatePricingToBilling FROM USED_AMOUNT ORDER BY DATE DESC LIMIT 1),-3) AS diskPrice FROM azurecost_disk
SELECT ipAddr FROM USER_LIST WHERE rscGrp = #{rscGrp}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER_DISK_USAGE ( rsg_grp ,partition_name ,disk_name ,crt_dtm ) values ( #{rscparam} , #{partitionName} , #{diskName} , (SELECT DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y%m%d%H%i%S')) ) on duplicate key update rsg_grp = values(rsg_grp) ,partition_name = values(partition_name) ,disk_name = values(disk_name) ,crt_dtm = (SELECT DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y%m%d%H%i%S'))
mapper.update: UPDATE USER_DISK_USAGE SET disk_name = #{diskName} WHERE rsg_grp = #{rscparam} AND partition_name = #{partitionName}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM USER_DISK_USAGE WHERE rsg_grp = #{rscparam} AND partition_name = #{partitionName} AND disk_name = #{diskName}
